english.segment1: This life I'm living. I'm so quick to call it mine. These days these hours. The moments we call time. But ever beat of my heart. And every breath I take. Are ones that You have given. Reminding me that always
english.segment2: For You I was created. To sing salvation's song. For You have bought me. With Your blood. To You I do belong
english.segment3: Only a Savior. Would pay so great a price. How deep the love must be. That would make such a sacrifice
english.segment4: How could I ever thank You. What could I ever say. Except that I will follow You. And with my life I will proclaim
english.segment5: For You I was created. To sing salvation's song. For You have bought me. With Your blood. To You I do belong
english.segment6: And every beat of my heart. And every breath I take. Are ones that You have given. Reminding me that always
english.segment7: For You I was created. To sing salvation's song. For You have bought me. With Your blood. To You I do belong
